name: BIT APES by BAYC Members
description: Created by BAYC members from their IP rights, NO DUPLICATES to Bored Ape Yacht Club on Ethereum, this is the expansion collection inscribed onto the Bitcoin blockchain as Ordinals. Bit Apes is the only legitimate bored ape expansion collection on the BTC blockchain. Beware of scams! Only BAYC members can use the BAYC intellectual property. A true expansion collection of bored apes on sats with a downloadable 4000 x 4000 pixels PFP image ready for large-format prints.
